title: Design Document - Channel-Specific Interaction Patterns
response:
Feedback Summary (2 comments):

Specific Text Comments:
1. "**Expected Structure:**
```
AGENTS/
├── agent-prod...": This is partially correct, under AGENTS directory, they are only submodules, the real project should be under the same hierarchy as AGENTS directory.
2. "Shadow Repo": This should be shadow-agent-artist, shadow-agent-designer, shadow-agent-programmer

comments.comment: This is partially correct, under AGENTS directory, they are only submodules, the real project should be under the same hierarchy as AGENTS directory.
comments.selectedText:
**Expected Structure:**
```
AGENTS/
├── agent-producer/          # Orchestrator agent
├── agent-artist/            # Worker agent (art/design)
├── agent-designer/          # Worker agent (documentation)
├── agent-programmer/        # Worker agent (code)
├── shadow-agent-artist/     # Shadow monitor for artist
├── shadow-agent-designer/   # Shadow monitor for designer
├── shadow-agent-programmer/ # Shadow monitor for programmer
└── shared/                  # Shared utilities (BaseBot)
```

comments.comment: This should be shadow-agent-artist, shadow-agent-designer, shadow-agent-programmer
